question: Which of the following BEST describes a positioning statement?

answers.text: It is a brief description of your offering, how it meets the needs of a consumer, and why it is superior to your competitor’s offerings.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. That is a perceptual map.

answers.text: It sets forth the group(s) of people with shared characteristics that you’ve identified as potential customers for your products.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. That is a target market.

answers.text: It defines where your offering fits in the marketplace and why it is better than competitors’ offerings.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. That is market segmentation.

answers.text: It is a visual tool designed to demonstrate the perception of your offerings by the average target market consumer vis-à-vis your competitors’ offerings.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: A positioning statement defines where your offering fits in the marketplace and why it is better than competitors’ offerings.

detailedSolution: A positioning statement defines where your offering fits in the marketplace and why it is better than competitors’ offerings.
